iterations.text: Task 3.1: GitHub Service Console Validation - Create console script to test GitHub API integration with real credentials. Test infer_base_branch method. Reference: @spec-orchestrator.md
Task 3.2: Cursor Service Console Validation - Create console script to test Cursor agent launch with real API credentials. Test launch_agent method with webhook URL. Reference: @spec-orchestrator.md
Task 3.3: LLM Service Console Validation - Create console script to test LLM service integration. Test generate_spec method with real API credentials. Reference: @spec-orchestrator.md
